alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL HILLSBOROUGH COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tampa, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, East Lake-Orient Park, University, Egypt Lake-Leto, Palm River-Clair Mel, Busch Gardens, Ybor City, Florida State Fairgrounds, Mango, Tampa Executive Airport, Channelside, University Of South Florida, Lettuce Lake Park, Orient Park, and University Of Tampa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
